data.persona: I grow a beard and shave it off.  I pee standing up.  I hunt and gather for my village.  I made my own crossbow.
data.description:
You are in the Temple courtyard.
There are lots of ornate statues everywhere.  It is pretty busy because everyone comes here to pray. There are colorful pieces of cloth tied randomly everywhere.  There is also a huge statue in the middle that everyone is gathered around to pray.
There's a statue, a book, a cross, a cloth, an ornate statue, and a huge statue here.
The priest and the woman are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a rope belt.

data.short_motivation: I wish to use the cross while I pray
data.mid_motivation: I want to become better acquainted with the church and the priests now that I have rededicated myself to religion
data.long_motivation: I hope to begin a better, more virtuous life
